disclosures.entity: Taiwanese Government and Taipei Economic & Cultural Office
disclosures.details: At the invitation of the Taiwanese Government and extended by the Representative from the Taipei Economic & Cultural Office in Australia, my wife and I visited Taiwan from 1 May 2014 until 6 May 2014. All travel, accommodation and hospitality during this visit was provided by the Taiwanese Government.

On Saturday evening, 28 June 2014, my wife and I attended a corporate box at Campbelltown Stadium as guests of Western Suburbs Leagues Club where we watched the Wests Tigers -vs- Canberra Raiders rugby league game. During the course of the evening we were provided with hospitality, food and drinks.

On Sunday 24 August 2014, my wife and I attended Cabramatta Leagues Club's corporate box at Cabramatta Sports Ground as guests of Cabramatta Leagues Club where we watched various rugby league games. During the course of the day we were provided with hospitality, food and drinks.

On 18 September 2014, I was invited to meet with Directors and Management of Energy Developments (EDL) located at Eight Mile Plans, Queensland, to discuss various policy issues and the likely impact on the company's sustainable energy business. EDL provided air travel and overnight accommodation for my wife and I I and at their invitation, we also attended the Managing Director's dinner function in Brisbane.

As a member of the Parliamentary Friends of Rugby League, the NRL have provided me with a complimentary membership of Wests Tigers. The package for this membership is a season pass, general admission, and is valid for the 2015 NRL season.

On Wednesday 7 January 2015 I attended Day 2 of the Australia vs India Cricket Test at the Sydney Cricket Ground as a guest of the Westpac Group. During the course of the day I was provided with hospitality, food and drinks in the company's private box.

On Saturday 15 August 2015, my wife and I attended a corporate box at Campbelltown Stadium as guests of Western Suburbs Leagues Club where we watched the Wests Tigers -v- Newcastle rugby league game. During the course of the day we were provided with hospitality, food and drinks.
On 22 September 2015 my wife, Bernadette, and I received our renewed membership cards to Virgin Australia Airlines Pty Ltd's The Club.
During November 2015 I purchased a new Ford XR6 Ute from Macarthur Ford, Campbelltown. This vehicle was purchased through Power Torque Finance.

On Monday 4 January 2016, at the invitation of Westpac Group, I attended Day 2 of the Australia -v- West Indies Cricket Test at the Sydney Cricket Ground. During the course of the day I was provided with hospitality, food and drinks.
